import React from'react';import'../css/skills.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Skills(){const categories={'Programming Languages':['Java','Python','C++','JavaScript','TypeScript','SQL','HTML/CSS','Shell Scripting'],'Frameworks & Libraries':['Spring Boot','Spring MVC','Spring Security','Django','Flask','React.js','Node.js','Nginx','REST APIs','GraphQL'],'Cloud Platforms & DevOps':['AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, SNS, SQS, IAM)','Azure','Docker','Jenkins','Terraform','Kubernetes'],'Databases':['MySQL','PostgreSQL','MongoDB','DynamoDB','Redis','NoSQL'],'Monitoring & Logging':['Prometheus','Grafana','ELK Stack','Elastic APM','Datadog'],'Messaging & Streaming':['Apache Kafka','RTMP','HLS','AWS SQS','Celery']};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-grid",children:Object.entries(categories).map((_ref,index)=>{let[category,skills]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"skill-category",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"skill-list",children:skills.map((skill,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"skill-item",children:["\u25B9 ",skill]},i))})]},index);})})})});}export default Skills;
